com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class TransactionFlowManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.TransactionFlowManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransactionFlowManagerService

    public class TransactionFlowManagerService
extends Object
implements ITransactionFlowManagerService
    Provides the implementations for the transaction flow operations defined in the ITransactionFlowManagerService.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Since:
    3.8.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    ITransactionFlowManagerService

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • updateTransaction

        public TransactionResponse updateTransaction(TransactionParameters transactionParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Updates the current transaction with the required offer information, payment tender information, tip amounts, cash back/cash access information, transaction confirmation etc.. The information provided will vary according to the processing rules. (E.g.: "submit offers" processing rule will require any selected offers for a given transaction and "submit offers and payment tenders" rule would need to provide both selected offers and the payment instrument.
        Specified by:
        updateTransaction in interface ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Parameters:
        transactionParameters - the transaction parameters containing offers, payment tender information, tip amounts, cash back/cash access information, transaction confirmation etc.. required for the next processing rule.
        Returns:
        the transaction response containing necessary transaction information along with the current/next processing rules.

      • retrieveTransactionMetaData

        public TransactionMetaDataResponse retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters transactionMetaDataParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Retrieves meta-data information related to a transaction. The information required to submit along with the transactionMetaDataParameters parameter and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse properties will vary according to the processing rules. For example during a "discovery" processing rule, the TransactionMetaDataParameters would require to provide the checkoutToken value and the returned TransactionMetaDataResponse would contain the information related to the checkoutToken along with the next processing rule. Some of the calls to ITransactionFlowManagerService.retrieveTransactionMetaData(TransactionMetaDataParameters) might require providing the TransactionMetaDataParameters.setExecutingFlowRule(com.paydiant.android.core.enums.transactionflow.TransactionFlowRule).
        Specified by:
        retrieveTransactionMetaData in interface ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Parameters:
        transactionMetaDataParameters - transaction meta data parameters containing checkout token value, paydiant reference id, receipt/offer search parameters along with the current execution rule. These parameter properties would be mandatory or optional depending on the next execution rule.
        Returns:
        meta data information related to the provided transaction meta data parameters.

      • refreshSecurityToken

        public SecurityTokenInfo refreshSecurityToken(TransactionTokenParameters transactionTokenParameters)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Refreshes the security token info with a new mobile session key (MSK)
        Specified by:
        refreshSecurityToken in interface ITransactionFlowManagerService
        Parameters:
        transactionTokenParameters - TransactionTokenParameters with the transaction token value
        Returns:
        SecurityTokenInfo with new MSK
